title: Espada Preta (Aphanopus carbo)
body: A Trichiuridae fish, almost exclusive to the deep seas of Madeira, where it is found in large quantities. Exclusively caught by the fishermen of Câmara de Lobos, it is a tasty fish that extensively supplies the market in Funchal. Its capture takes place at a depth of about 1000 fathoms, making it one of the deepest fisheries in the world. The swordfish, once very cheap, now sells for 60, 70, and 80 cents each in the Funchal market.

Câmara de Lobos: Exclusive harvesting location of the Espada Preta fish
Funchal: Market where the Espada Preta fish is sold
